title: Replace Hero flash-card image with full-stack development themed illustration

requirements.summary: Replace the Hero right-side image with a full-stack development themed static asset while preserving the existing Hero layout and effects.
acceptanceCriteria: No "female flash card" image appears anywhere on the site after the change.

The Hero section's right-side image (currently /assets/generated/profile.dim_900x1100.png) is replaced with a full-stack development related image and still renders correctly across mobile/tablet/desktop.
The replacement image uses the same static-asset approach (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) and does not introduce new network calls at runtime.
The new image preserves existing styling/behavior in HeroSection (rounded card, subtle tilt/hover, parallax), with no layout shifts or broken aspect ratios.

file_operations.description: Add the new full-stack development themed Hero illustration as a static generated asset (replacement for the prior "female flash card" image) so the UI can reference it without any runtime network calls.
Update the Hero right-side image source to use /assets/generated/profile-fullstack.dim_900x1100.png while keeping the existing rounded card, subtle tilt/hover, and parallax behavior unchanged.
Remove the old generated "female flash card" image asset to ensure it cannot appear anywhere in the portfolio UI via accidental/legacy references.
